file_content.text: Do not judge him harshly. This trial was necessary for all of us.
Don't kill him.
We need the Scions.
You saw what I just did. I don't need anyone.
My power is greater.
If the Scions still want to help us, I accept.
I'm willing to join forces.
We need friends--not necessarily Scions.
We can find other allies.
Do we? Or is that your guilt speaking?
Guilt clouds your judgment.
The blood of Tyth flows through you, Outlander. Please do not force us to spill it.
Stand. Down. Now.
You heard the lady.
I'd listen to Lana.
Your lives mean nothing to me. Surrender, or they open fire.
Surrender or die.
You don't need the Force to see what happens next. Put down your weapons.
Be smart about this.
Every moment since you entered, even this one, was predestined. Everyone here played the role fate assigned them.
One person shouldn't decide the fate of the galaxy. When the time comes, we can work together.
We'll figure it out.
I've been saving this galaxy my whole life. I'm starting to think the only way it'll stay saved is when I'm running it.
I'll be in full control.
Arcann may have struck a blow at the Republic, but I still believe in its ideals.
The Republic will fix things.
Only the Empire can bring order to the chaos Arcann has caused.
The Empire will rise again.
He will not stand in your way.
He will not live to do that.
The Republic is weak. The only way it can serve the galaxy is to fade away.
The Empire is crippled by power-hungry fools. I abandoned it for a reason.
You have nothing further to reveal. I now know what blinded us to the future. Our Immortal Emperor lives.... inside your mind.
It couldn't stay secret forever.
No. That's not possible.
You should've told me. I deserved to know.
I wasn't sure what was real.
I was confused.
You saved my life. I owed you the truth. I'm sorry, Lana.
You're right.
So you could run experiments on me? I had to protect myself.
No, you didn't.
You knew about this, and didn't tell me?
You didn't need to know.
Yes, exactly.
We thought you'd panic if I said, "Hey! Emperor Valkorion's living inside my head."
We had to take precautions.
Where's the fun if I just lay all my baggage on the table from the start? Now we have something new to talk about.
[Flirt] Secrets are good.
Analysis: Scan reveals no evidence you possess a secondary personality matrix, master. It is possible your brain is simply malfunctioning.
Our duel gave me a glimpse of what's to come. You will destroy the Eternal Throne.... but many will suffer before that victory.
Tell me who suffers, and I'll do what I can to avoid it.
I don't want that.
I like my victories to be a surprise. Keeps everyone guessing.
Wait, don't ruin the ending!
We should compare lists of names. Mine's a long one.
People get hurt. Nothing new.
Let me guess--your vision didn't specify who suffers... or how long defeating Arcann will take.
Vague answers. How convenient.
Doesn't matter. We win. If Emperor Valkorion lives because of this Outlander, there's hope for Zakuul.
Your beloved Immortal Emperor is a threat to all life, everywhere.
We must find a way to separate you from him.
Maybe, someday. Until then, we've got a war to fight.
First we need to win this war.
It's more complicated than that. He's nothing like he was before. And I may need him.
He's useful for now.
No one wants Valkorion out of my head more than I do. But removing him won't be easy.
It's not that simple.
We have a lot to discuss.
Not here.
I passed your test. Join us or don't. Either way, we're done.
There is one truth left to reveal. I withheld the true reason I followed you through the trials.
To understand the Outlander who will destroy Arcann and Vaylin.... my son and daughter.
Haha.... She told you. How delightful. Haha....
You're certain she helped them?
I killed three Knights to make sure they weren't lying, and another three because I hate odd numbers.
Senya was always strong-willed. That's why father loved her.
Do you think she knows he's alive? Has she betrayed us for him?
It doesn't matter. She'll return to us or face the consequences.
We don't need them. Our parents gave us the power to forge the future. They should've known we'd use it.
I ask you a final question: what future do you see for this galaxy when Arcann and his Eternal Fleet are gone?
The Outlander escaped in the Gravestone with our mother's help. She's against us.
What must be, will be.
